title: A sermon of Gods prouidence Very godly and profitable: preached at South-shoobery in Essex, by Arthur Dent, Minister of Gods word.
author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.
notes: An edition of Dent, Arthur.  A platforme, made for the proofe of Gods providence.
Imperfect; stained and several pages tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.
